wikipedia_page.main: Charles Thomas Reece (born 8 September 1988), is an English former footballer who played as a midfielder and is now a Business Development Manager at TripleFast Middle East Ltd.

response: *  – Kayne McLaggon and Michael Boateng joined Tonbridge Angels on loan, while Charlie Reece joined Gloucester City also on loan.
*  – Bristol Rovers signed Stoke City midfielder Matthew Lund on a monthlong loan. Charlie Reece joined Tamworth on loan for one month.
